string.name: movePieceFromE2ToE4
string.comment:
movePieceFromE2ToE4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

moveKnightToC3
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

string.name: dropARookAtB4
string.comment:
dropARookAtB4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Jatuhkan benteng di b4 (Varian crazyhouse saja)

string.name: readOutOpponentName
string.comment:
readOutOpponentName
Press a button on the keyboard to hear the opponent's name aloud. The feature is most useful for blind players.

resources.string: Jika notasi di atas tidak familier, pelajari lebih lanjut disini:

string.name: bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
string.comment:
bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
Only the Latin character 'o' works.

resources.string: Huruf \"o\" dan angka \"0\" dapat digunakan untuk rokade
Jika diperbolehkan rokade dikedua sisi, gunakan \'enter\' untuk rokade pendek
Huruf kapital hanya berpengaruh di situasi ambigu menyangkut gajah dan pion b
Untuk pra-langkah, ketik langkah yang diinginkan sebelum giliran anda
